UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Effect of dimerization of a beta-turn antimicrobial peptide, PST13-RK, on antimicrobial activity and mammalian cell toxicity.
Literature.Author: Yang ST, Kim JI, Shin SY

Literature.Title: Design of perfectly symmetric Trp-rich peptides with potent and broad-spectrum antimicrobial activities.
Literature.Author: Yang ST, Shin SY, Hahm KS, Kim JI

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Mouse fibroblasts NIH 3T3:IC50=83 µg/ml,Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=>200 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli KCTC 1682(MIC=8µg/ml),Salmonella typhimurium KCTC 1926(MIC=2µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa KCTC 1637(MIC=8µg/ml),Proteus vulgaris KCTC 2433(MIC=8µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis KCTC 1918(MIC=2µg/ml),Streptococcus pyogenes KCTC 3096(MIC=8µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus KCTC 1621(MIC=4µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis KCTC 1917(MIC=2µg/ml),Human lung carcinoma A549(IC50=90µg/ml),Human breast adenocarcinoma MDA-MB-361(IC50=80µg/ml)
